resources.string:
My name is Fabrício Lélis. I am a Msc. candidate in Computer Science from COPIN, located at the Federal University of Campina Grande. 
I have a BS in Computer Science from the same university (2008). 
I participated for three years in the Brazil-IP project that aims to develop talents in design of digital systems and intellectual property (IPs). 
This work happened in Dedicated Architectures Laboratory (LAD). 
 I participated for one year ALTATV project that aims to develop a set-top-box for digital TV in Brazil at low cost. 
I was a member of the DH-CETENE for three years. The mission of the Design House was to provide high quality services in research and development and design of circuits and systems. The DH-CETENE is a member of CI-Brazil, a government program maintained by the Ministry of Science and Technology ( MCT ).
